data.description: It has been quite some time since the explosive growth of NFTs in 2021. In today’s crypto market, the excitement around NFTs in various applications like GameFi, SocialFi, and other blue-chip projects in 2024 has dwindled significantly compared to the previous year.
data.title: BeArt: A platform focused on global high-value art RWA and WEB3 encrypted asset issuance and trading. The first Genesis NFT series is coming soon!

data.description:
BeArt’s first Genesis NFT series — Visionary Club is coming soon.
For BeArt, a platform dedicated to creating RWA art assets, it’s worth exploring the decision to anchor NFTs as the overall user benefits of the platform in advance.
data.title: BeArt’s First Genesis NFT Series | Join the Visionary Club and become a true art collector!

data.description: In the realm where technology intersects with art, BeArt stands as a pioneering platform, redefining the landscape of art ownership through the fusion of Real World Assets (RWA) and Web3 encrypted assets.
data.title: BeArt — Revolutionizing Art Ownership and Circulation with RWA and Web3
